Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: aragua11
Reviews.Content: Great Phone, the best undoubtedly brought everything indicated by the publication, is great quality, has exceeded my expectations. Great buy. From Venezuela recommend

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: ron mark
Reviews.Content: still getting used to it , but its a nice phone , good battery life good picture quality and sound quality .. low on memory tho

Reviews.Title: Good cellphone
Reviews.Author: Osman M.
Reviews.Content: This is a good choice as smartphone for those who doesn't want to expend a too much money in a cellphone, works perfectly fine with the carriers of my country.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Custard
Reviews.Content: The phone overall, its okay! Now please dont order this phone if your a social network junky or an on the fly kind of person. The phone runs a 800 Mhz processor and around 512 MB ram. Basically the phone is for everyday simply use. But your mail, whatsapp and such will work okay, but please dont expect to be running tweeter, facebook and skype at the sametime.. Noways aint gona happen

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: David Correa
Reviews.Content: It was all that i expected, good phone, very easy to use. Anyway, samsung have really good smartphone, i always like it.

Reviews.Title: Faulty speaker
Reviews.Author: andy
Reviews.Content: The main problem is that the speaker on the back is known to have a faulty connection and over time (4 months for me), the sound will go completely.  No ringer, no speakerphone, no media ... if you don't believe me, just google s5830 speaker and you'll find a lot of places selling replacement speakers ...Since I live in the USA, samsung does not service international phones.  Not worth the price in my opinion ...

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Suryadinata I Ketut Gede
Reviews.Content: Its so cool,,, I love it and I look forward to see another product from samsung. Thank you for a nice product

Reviews.Title: super
Reviews.Author: kalyn
Reviews.Content: its perfect. small like the iphone so it's a perfect fit into my little world.  a clerk even commented it was small and she liked the size.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Manny
Reviews.Content: I purchase this cell phone to be used during my last trip to Cuba, and it works, it is very nice looking cell.

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: joylyn
Reviews.Content: a really good phone!!! Especially for new smartphone users. Very basic and to the point. It just takea a little getting used to. But its a great.buy!

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Clytrice Watson
Reviews.Content: The phone is nice but it has some functional problems. I had it for about 3 weeks and now it randomly shuts down. I ordered a new battery in hopes of resolving the issue, but it still shuts down without cause. This is my second time purchasing this phone. The first time the touch screen stopped working. Because it is an international version, I cannot get any customer support in the United States. With that being said, I will likely return the phone. I am very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: samsun galaxy ace s5830
Reviews.Author: yliana guaipo
Reviews.Content: Hello chose this rate because the product is excellent and I liked it because it is promoted and recommend it to everyone

Reviews.Title: Phone issues
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: I am a litte disappointed with this product.  I have had many issues with this phone. Sometimes it won't dial out or recieve calls, while I am talking on my phone it will often drop the call, this happens at least once a day if not more it's very frustrating. Recently the screen on my phone has been filckering while in sleep mode. I wouldn't recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Change of opinion, not recommended product, the phone is the Samsung Galaxy Ace S5830V is not the S5830i
Reviews.Author: XAVIER MENDEZ
Reviews.Content: Initially had recommended this product but verifying it does not correspond to the model indicated.Change of opinion, not recommended product, the phone is the Samsung Galaxy Ace S5830i S5830V is not as indicated by the seller,Change of opinion, not recommended product, the phone is the Samsung Galaxy Ace S5830V is not the S5830i,thank you very much

Reviews.Title: this phone is not a new phone as stated.
Reviews.Author: Adolphus Watts
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone in cotober never worked properly.had it flush twice still don't work.phone turns on  but would not open screen very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: merry christmas
Reviews.Author: RICARDO MAYORGA
Reviews.Content: An early Christmas gift I know its and old version of everything but I think its good for a first time cellphone owner.

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy ace s5830
Reviews.Author: fareeha aysha
Reviews.Content: mostly this phone dose not work.its shut off automatically.so i do not like this phone.i try to return it but seller said no.

Reviews.Title: Good Value for quality easy to use phone
Reviews.Author: J. Malaguti "Jacques.M"
Reviews.Content: Very good value and efficient phone to someone  starting to use Android. Lightweight and solid built. Camera gives sharp pictures.

Reviews.Title: Hate it
Reviews.Author: Johan
Reviews.Content: I changed the language to English but the apps are still n chino, please get me a solution please help me

Reviews.Title: Got it what I wanted
Reviews.Author: I. seshie
Reviews.Content: Got it what I wanted , This phone is a good and very reliable, I bought this phone to use in Africa and London and it perform wonderful. I am buying this particular phone for my step brother in Ghana

Reviews.Title: super fast and very well
Reviews.Author: emilys machado
Reviews.Content: excellent good buy all very fast good product as is the description of the equipment. all very well thank you very much

Reviews.Title: very very bad
Reviews.Author: Edgardo Vinicio Tencio Marin "EVTM"
Reviews.Content: Customers do not buy this phone, it comes without accessories, the battery is not original and also the phone turns itself off, I am disappointed with the product, I honestly do not recommend it, and also the phone the new buy and revising without battery says rebuilt me I feel totally ripped off, do not buy this article.

Reviews.Title: not what i expecpted
Reviews.Author: April L. Brantley "tennessee girl"
Reviews.Content: cannot recieve picture message"s,will not play music i bought from the play store. wifi on it totally sux,if i had kept my old phone and not threw the manal away for this phone i would have sent it back.
